text: Leslie Ann Charleson (February 22, 1945 â€“ January 12, 2025) was an American actress. She was best known for her role as Monica Quartermaine on the ABC daytime soap opera General Hospital. Charleson died in Los Angeles, California on January 12, 2025 from problems caused by a fall at the age of 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1945 births Category:2025 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from Kansas City, Missouri Category:Accidental deaths from falls in the United States
